references.paper_title: Practical Bayesian Optimization of Machine Learning Algorithms
references.reason: This paper is foundational for Bayesian Optimization (BO) and is frequently cited in BO research.
This is a seminal work introducing Gaussian Processes, a core component of the methods discussed in the subject paper.

references.paper_title: Variational Learning of Inducing Variables in Sparse Gaussian Processes
references.reason: This paper presents a key method for scaling Gaussian Processes (GPs) to larger datasets, which is central to the approach taken by the subject paper.
This work addresses the scalability of GPs, a crucial issue tackled in the subject paper.

references.paper_title: Design-Bench: Benchmarks for Data-Driven Offline Model-Based Optimization
references.reason: This paper provides a benchmark dataset used to evaluate the method proposed in the subject paper, showcasing its effectiveness in a real-world application.
